name: Lunar Holiday
description:
Short sci-fi adventure game. This game was made for #adventurejam 2015.

It was my first Twine project also my very first interactive fiction game ever. I had three personal goals for it:

  • Practise written English
  • Learn to write games in Twine
  • Sketch out the world for my game Spacr

The game ranked #20 in Best Gameplay and #38 in Overall category out of 70 games – Adventure Jam 2015 results

Gameplay by Jupi starts around 12:00
